entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Low plus 5.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 15. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 6 May 2023
